txt.en: Bahanneth was so pleased with the success of your mission to destroy the Orcs' weapons that he would like you to continue your efforts.

'My good [placeholder], your efforts were quite successful but the Orcs do not lack for numbers, and they continue to move supplies out from the depths of Moria.

'I think you should pay them another visit. We would not wish them to become complacent, after all, would we?

'Defeat the smiths that have come to replace those slain and destroy their new weapon-stores, then return here to me.'
Fanuidhol lies to the north-west of Talan Fanuidhol.\n\nBahanneth wants you to go into Fanuidhol and defeat some of the smiths there, as well as to destroy the stores of weapons they have forged.
'Excellent, excellent. You do us proud, [placeholder]. Confusion to our enemies!'
Bahanneth is at Talan Fanuidhol, south-east of Fanuidhol.\n\nYou should return to Bahanneth with tidings of your success.
'The Orcs of Moria are many, but they will break upon Lothl√≥rien like a light tide.'
'Your work for the inhabitants of the Golden Wood is most appreciated, [placeholder]!'
Talk to Bahanneth at Talan Fanuidhol
